Articles.Content:
Hello. 

I'm running a bone stock 1.0 game, and while flying my planes, i tend to underestimate the "pull up!" power of my plane while doing tricks around KSC, and crash into the ground many a time. Nothing new, right?

Well, 3 times now, when I crash the plane, the game "crashes" but doesn't actually crash. It freezes, with the explosion sound on a small loop. Very loud, very annoying, and I have to force KSP to close, which means no crash log. When I get home I will try and replicate it again, and post the Output log, but as for now I just have the story.

This also slows down my computer for a while, whilst it tries to figure out what's hogging all its memory. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
